page.title: 02BEACHES/COASTLINE
page.content: NEWBIGGIN USED TO BE A DESERT. THE MOST POPULAR ROCK IS THE SAND STONE. IN THE FUTURE IF THE POWER STATION WAS TO CLOSE DOWN THE N.C.B. WOULD HAVE TO RESTORE THE{BEACHES}BACK TO THEIR ORIGINAL WAY WHICH WOULD BE A FOREST. THE NAMES OF SOME OF THE{FLOWERS}AND {SHRUBS}THAT WE SAW WERE CREEPING RED FESTOW,CUCKOO RASS, MOUSE EARS, SCURVEY GRASS,AND SOME GREENERY CALLED ALGAE. SOME OF THE{BIRDS}WE SAW WERE CALLED BLACK HEADED GULL,LITTLE RINGED PLOVER,CROW, AND A LITTLE BIRD CALLED WHITE WINGED PIPPET. THE HORSES THAT GRAZE THERE PREVENT THE SHRUBS GROWING LARGER WHEN THEY STAND ON THEM AND EAT THEM.THEN WE SAW SOME CONCRETE BLOCKS FROM THE WORLD WAR TWO. TO STOP ENEMY TANKS FROM GETTING UP THE BEACHES.
